FEATURES OF THE FEEDER BUSES
0-4 KM: 5 Rs., 4-10 KM: 10 Rs. and more than 10 KM: 15 Rs.
The buses can seat 18 to 20 people with 10 persons standing. They are environment friendly with CNG engine. Control Centers are being set up to monitor the movement of vehicles and will have traffic managers, traffic inspectors and Control Room Operators.
Buses are fan cooled.First Aid Box and Fire Extinguisher are provided in the buses.
